question: Is it permissible for me to perform Asr salaat at time when it commences according to Imaam Shafi'i ?
answer:
QUESTION
The time of Asr prayer commences only sortly after the timings for my job starts. The next break i have is only after maghrib. Is it permissible for me to perform Asr salaat at time when it commences according to Imaam Shafi'i ? (I am a hanafi)
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible for you to perform Asr Salaat according to the Shaafi'ee
Fiqh time.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
